content.event: Adapting Java for the Serverless world (perspective of an AWS developer)
content.description: Adapting Java for the Serverless world (from the perspective of the AWS developer) Beschreibung Java is for many years one of the most popular programming languages, but it used to have hard times in the Serverless Community. Java is known for its high cold start times and high memory footprint. For both you have to pay to the cloud providers of your choice.
Serão 5 dias de conteúdo com 13 palestras com especialistas em desenvolvimento Serverless do Brasil e do mundo, explorando as possibilidades para você mergulhar de vez neste tema!
content.organizer: Dos grupos de usuários de AWS do Brasil

content.description: Czy kiedykolwiek zastanawiałeś się nad budowaniem aplikacji nie myśląc o serwerze, na którym będzie ona działała, nie martwić się o zarządzanie i obsługę nimi lub środowisk wykonawczych? Wyobraź sobie, że możesz zbudować prawie każdy typ aplikacji w ten właśnie sposób – bez myślenia o infrastrukturze, w sposób zapewniający dużą dostępność, skalowalność, minimalizację kosztów.

content.event: Deploying Your First Serverless Application on IBM Cloud
content.description: Building serverless applications is the new trend in developing easy and cheap cloud-native applications. Join us in this Arabic webinar to know more about serverless applications

When we talk about Serverless on AWS, everyone always thinks about Lambda. But sometimes a serverless architecture is only possible because of other services that are often not thought of as “serverless”. In fact, the first two AWS services (SQS and S3) were serverless!

content.event: What's new with serverless on GCP?
content.description: With Google Cloud Next coming to an end, there have been several announcements and improvements to the GCP services. The serverless services like Cloud Functions and Cloud Run are no exception to this. In fact, the new features on these services might be the best ones out of all!

content.event: AWS Fargate ile Serverless mikroservis yonetimi
content.description: 28 Ekim akşamı bu sefer geniş bir yelpazeyi konuşacağız. Gunumuz IT ekosisteminde konteynirlar ve konterynir orkestratorler sirketlerin urunlerini hizli bir sekilde gelistirip musteriyle bulusturmasinda, dolayisiyla ozellikle mikroservis mimarilerde onemli ve stratejik bir yere sahip.
Third edition of ServerlessDays Virtual with a busload of great speakers and talks.

This talk focuses on explaining the different compute models available for Cloud and the differences between them. Functions-as-a-Service is the topmost layer providing maximum ease to develop with least concern about handling the infrastructure. FaaS approaches the developers with the idea of focussing on code and enhancements.

content.event: Funktionales Domain Modeling von Serverless Microservices
content.description: Martin Lorenz und Christoph Wanasek beschäftigen sich seit vielen Jahren als Software Architekten und Entwickler mit DDD und Event basierten Architekturen. Aufbauend auf den Ideen aus Scott Wlaschins Buch "Domain Modeling Made Functional" zeigen sie, wie funktionales Domain Modeling für eine Serverless [1] Umgebung in der Praxis umgesetzt werden kann.

The session will also walkthrough a specific implementation of the Serverless unified streaming architecture based on an on-premises simulation of a MySQL database as input channel and Amazon DynamoDB as the enriched data destination, that you can deploy into your own AWS account for experimenting and evolving this architecture to address your business challenges.

Celem warsztatu jest wprowadzenie do Serverless Framework w chmurze AWS. Będziemy rozwijać backend w architekturze serverless dla prostej aplikacji do zarządzania notatkami i załącznikami. Zostaną omówione podstawowe usługi AWS wraz z ich najważniejszymi funkcjami oraz możliwymi integracjami.
RestAPI development with AWS Lambda - Node.js. As you know, Serverless architecture is getting more to the table day by day. Let see how it work together ;)

ServerlessDays Stockholm is a developer-oriented conference about serverless technologies. We believe in and encourage practical sessions, in which developers share their experience and lessons from real-world projects. This time with an all Nordics speaker line-up.
